00022 void eol_button_configure(eolConfig *conf)
00023 {
00024   eolLine buf;
00025   eolLine buttonfile,buttonhitfile,buttonhighfile;
00026   _eol_component_button_offset_x = 0;
00027   _eol_component_button_offset_y = 0;
00028   eol_vec3d_set(_eol_component_button_color[0],0.8,0.8,0.8);
00029   eol_vec3d_set(_eol_component_button_color[1],1,1,0);
00030   eol_vec3d_set(_eol_component_button_color[2],0.6,0.6,0.6);
00031   eol_line_cpy(buttonfile,"images/UI/btn.png");
00032   eol_line_cpy(buttonhitfile,"images/UI/btn_hit.png");
00033   eol_line_cpy(buttonhighfile,"images/UI/btn_high.png");
00034   if (conf != NULL)
00035   {
00036     eol_config_get_int_by_tag(&_eol_component_button_offset_x,conf,"button_x_offset");
00037     eol_config_get_int_by_tag(&_eol_component_button_offset_y,
00038                               conf,
00039                               "button_y_offset");
00040     eol_config_get_line_by_tag(buf,conf,"button_file");
00041     if (strlen(buf) > 0)
00042     {
00043       eol_line_cpy(buttonfile,buf);
00044     }
00045     eol_config_get_line_by_tag(buf,conf,"button_high_file");
00046     if (strlen(buf) > 0)
00047     {
00048       eol_line_cpy(buttonhighfile,buf);
00049     }
00050     eol_config_get_line_by_tag(buf,conf,"button_hit_file");
00051     if (strlen(buf) > 0)
00052     {
00053       eol_line_cpy(buttonhitfile,buf);
00054     }
00055     eol_config_get_vec3d_by_tag(&_eol_component_button_color[0],conf,"button_text_color");
00056     eol_config_get_vec3d_by_tag(&_eol_component_button_color[1],conf,"button_high_text_color");
00057     eol_config_get_vec3d_by_tag(&_eol_component_button_color[2],conf,"button_hit_text_color");
00058     eol_config_get_bool_by_tag(&_eol_component_button_text_outline,conf,"button_text_outline");
00059   }
00060   _eol_component_stock_button[0] = eol_sprite_load(buttonfile,-1,-1);
00061   _eol_component_stock_button[1] = eol_sprite_load(buttonhighfile,-1,-1);
00062   _eol_component_stock_button[2] = eol_sprite_load(buttonhitfile,-1,-1);
00063 }

00065 void eol_button_get_stock_size(eolUint *w, eolUint *h)
00066 {
00067   if (_eol_component_stock_button[0] == NULL)return;
00068   if (w)*w = _eol_component_stock_button[0]->frameWidth;
00069   if (h)*h = _eol_component_stock_button[0]->frameHeight;
00070 }
00071 
00072 eolComponentButton *eol_component_get_button_data(eolComponent *component)
00073 {
00074   if ((!component)||
00075     (!component->componentData)||
00076     (component->type != eolButtonComponent))
00077   {
00078     return NULL;
00079   }
00080   return (eolComponentButton*)component->componentData;
00081 }
00082 
00083 void eol_component_button_free(eolComponent *component)
00084 {
00085   eolComponentButton *button;
00086   int i;
00087   button = eol_component_get_button_data(component);
00088   if (button)return;
00089   for (i = 0; i < eolButtonStateMax; i++)
00090   {
00091     if (button->button[i] != NULL)
00092     {
00093       eol_sprite_free(&button->button[i]);
00094     }
00095   }
00096   free(button);
00097   button = NULL;
00098   component->componentData = NULL;
00099 }
00100 
00101 eolBool eol_component_button_update(eolComponent *component)
00102 {
00103   eolVec2D v;
00104   eolInt x,y;
00105   eolBool mod = eolTrue;
00106   eolComponentButton *button = NULL;
00107   if (!component)return eolFalse;
00108   button = eol_component_get_button_data(component);
00109 
00110   component->oldState = component->state;
00111   eol_mouse_get_position(&x,&y);
00112   v.x = x;
00113   v.y = y;
00114   if (button->hotkeymod)
00115   {
00116     mod = eol_input_is_mod_held(button->hotkeymod);
00117   }
00118   if ((button->input > 0) && (mod))
00119   {
00120     if (eol_input_is_key_pressed(button->input))
00121     {
00122       component->state = eolButtonPressed;
00123       return eolFalse;
00124     }
00125     if (eol_input_is_key_held(button->input))
00126     {
00127       component->state = eolButtonPressed;
00128       return eolFalse;
00129     }
00130     if (eol_input_is_key_released(button->input))
00131     {
00132       component->state = eolButtonIdle;
00133       return eolTrue;
00134     }
00135   }
00136   if (eol_vec_in_rect(v,component->bounds))
00137   {
00138     component->state = eolButtonHighlight;
00139     if (eol_mouse_input_held(eolMouseLeft))
00140     {
00141       component->state = eolButtonPressed;
00142       return eolFalse;
00143     }
00144     if (eol_mouse_input_pressed(eolMouseLeft))
00145     {
00146       component->state = eolButtonPressed;
00147       return eolFalse;
00148     }
00149     else if (eol_mouse_input_released(eolMouseLeft))
00150     {
00151       component->state = eolButtonIdle;
00152       return eolTrue;
00153     }
00154     return eolFalse;
00155   }
00156   component->state = eolButtonIdle;
00157   return eolFalse;
00158 }
00159 
00160 void eol_component_button_draw_rect(eolComponent *component,eolRect bounds)
00161 {
00162   eolRect r;
00163   eolComponentButton *button = NULL;
00164   button = eol_component_get_button_data(component);
00165   if (!button)return;
00166   eol_draw_solid_rect(component->bounds,button->backgroundColor,button->backgroundAlpha);
00167   switch (component->state)
00168   {
00169     case eolButtonIdle:
00170       break;
00171     case eolButtonHighlight:
00172       eol_draw_solid_rect(component->bounds,button->highlightColor,0.3);
00173       break;
00174     case eolButtonPressed:
00175       eol_draw_solid_rect(component->bounds,button->pressColor,0.3);
00176       break;
00177   }
00178   
00179   eol_font_draw_text_justify(
00180     button->buttonText,
00181     component->bounds.x + 2,
00182     component->bounds.y + 2,
00183     _eol_component_button_color[component->state],
00184     button->alpha,
00185     button->fontSize,
00186     button->justify
00187   );
00188 
00189   eol_rect_copy(&r,component->bounds);
00190   r.x++;
00191   r.y++;
00192   r.h-=2;
00193   r.w-=2;
00194   eol_draw_rect(component->bounds,eol_vec3d(1,1,1),1);
00195   eol_draw_rect(r,eol_vec3d(1,1,1),1);
00196 }
00197 
00198 void eol_component_button_draw(eolComponent *component,eolRect bounds)
00199 {
00200   eolRect r;
00201   eolComponentButton *button = NULL;
00202   eolSprite *img = NULL;
00203   eolInt x,y;
00204   eolUint ofx = 0, ofy = 0;
00205   button = eol_component_get_button_data(component);
00206   x = bounds.x;
00207   y = bounds.y;
00208   if (button == NULL)return;
00209   r = eol_font_get_bounds(
00210     button->buttonText,
00211     button->fontSize
00212   );
00213   if ((component->state >= 0) &&
00214     (component->state < eolButtonStateMax))
00215   {
00216     img = button->button[component->state];
00217 
00218     if (img != NULL)
00219     {
00220       eol_sprite_draw(img,
00221                       0,
00222                       bounds.x,
00223                       bounds.y);
00224       x = bounds.x + (img->frameWidth/2);
00225       y = bounds.y + (img->frameHeight/2) - (r.h*0.5);
00226       ofx = _eol_component_button_offset_x;
00227       ofy = _eol_component_button_offset_y;
00228     }
00229     r.x = x + ofx;
00230     r.y = y + ofy;
00231     eol_font_draw_text_justify(
00232       button->buttonText,
00233       r.x,
00234       r.y,
00235       _eol_component_button_color[component->state],
00236       button->alpha,
00237       button->fontSize,
00238       button->justify
00239     );
00240     if ((button->buttonType == eolButtonText) &&
00241         (component->state == eolButtonHighlight) &&
00242         (_eol_component_button_text_outline))
00243     {
00244       eol_draw_rect(component->bounds,_eol_component_button_color[component->state],button->alpha);
00245     }
00246   }
00247 }
00248 
00249 void eol_component_make_button(
00250     eolComponent * component,
00251     char         * buttonText,
00252     eolUint        buttonType,
00253     eolInt         buttonHotkey,
00254     eolUint        buttonHotkeymod,
00255     eolLine        buttonUpFile,
00256     eolLine        buttonHighFile,
00257     eolLine        buttonDownFile,
00258     eolVec3D       backgroundColor,
00259     eolFloat       backgroundAlpha,
00260     eolVec3D       highlightColor,
00261     eolVec3D       pressColor
00262   )
00263 {
00264   eolRect r;
00265   eolComponentButton * button = NULL;
00266   if (!component)return;
00267   eol_component_button_new(component);
00268 
00269   button = eol_component_get_button_data(component);
00270   if (button == NULL)
00271   {
00272     return;
00273   }
00274   button->alpha = 1;
00275   button->fontSize = 3;
00276   button->input = buttonHotkey;
00277   button->hotkeymod = buttonHotkeymod;
00278 
00279   strncpy(button->buttonText,buttonText,EOLLINELEN);
00280   button->buttonType = buttonType;
00281   component->data_update = eol_component_button_update;
00282   component->data_free = eol_component_button_free;
00283   component->data_draw = eol_component_button_draw;
00284   switch(buttonType)
00285   {
00286     case eolButtonCustom:
00287       button->button[eolButtonIdle] = eol_sprite_load(buttonUpFile,-1,-1);
00288       button->button[eolButtonHighlight] = eol_sprite_load(buttonHighFile,-1,-1);
00289       button->button[eolButtonPressed] = eol_sprite_load(buttonDownFile,-1,-1);
00290       button->justify = eolJustifyCenter;
00291       component->bounds.w = button->button[eolButtonIdle]->frameWidth;
00292       component->bounds.h = button->button[eolButtonIdle]->frameHeight;
00293       break;
00294     case eolButtonText:
00295       button->button[eolButtonIdle] = NULL;
00296       button->button[eolButtonHighlight] = NULL;
00297       button->button[eolButtonPressed] = NULL;
00298       r = eol_font_get_bounds(buttonText,button->fontSize);
00299       component->bounds.w = r.w;
00300       component->bounds.h = r.h;
00301       button->justify = eolJustifyLeft;
00302       break;
00303     case eolButtonStock:
00304       button->button[eolButtonIdle] = _eol_component_stock_button[eolButtonIdle];
00305       button->button[eolButtonHighlight] = _eol_component_stock_button[eolButtonHighlight];
00306       button->button[eolButtonPressed] = _eol_component_stock_button[eolButtonPressed];
00307       button->justify = eolJustifyCenter;
00308       if (button->button[eolButtonIdle] != NULL)
00309       {
00310         component->bounds.w = button->button[eolButtonIdle]->frameWidth;
00311         component->bounds.h = button->button[eolButtonIdle]->frameHeight;
00312       }
00313       break;
00314     case eolButtonRect:
00315       component->data_draw = eol_component_button_draw_rect;
00316       eol_vec3d_copy(button->backgroundColor,backgroundColor);
00317       button->backgroundAlpha = backgroundAlpha;
00318       button->justify = eolJustifyLeft;
00319       eol_vec3d_copy(button->highlightColor,highlightColor);
00320       eol_vec3d_copy(button->pressColor,pressColor);
00321       break;
00322   }
00323 }
00324 
00325 void eol_component_button_new(eolComponent *component)
00326 {
00327   if (component->componentData != NULL)
00328   {
00329     eol_logger_message(
00330       EOL_LOG_WARN,
00331       "eol_component:tried to make a button out of an existing component\n");
00332     return;
00333   }
00334   component->componentData = malloc(sizeof(eolComponentButton));
00335   if (component->componentData == NULL)
00336   {
00337     eol_logger_message(
00338       EOL_LOG_ERROR,
00339       "eol_actor: failed to allocate data for new button\n");
00340     return;
00341   }
00342   memset(component->componentData,0,sizeof(eolComponentButton));
00343   component->type = eolButtonComponent;
00344 }

00346 eolComponent *eol_button_stock_new(
00347     eolUint        id,
00348     eolWord        name,
00349     eolRectFloat   rect,
00350     eolRect        bounds,
00351     char         * buttonText,
00352     eolInt         buttonHotkey,
00353     eolUint        buttonHotkeymod,
00354     eolBool        center
00355   )
00356 {
00357   return eol_button_new(
00358     id,
00359     name,
00360     rect,
00361     bounds,
00362     buttonText,
00363     eolButtonStock,
00364     buttonHotkey,
00365     buttonHotkeymod,
00366     center,
00367     NULL,
00368     NULL,
00369     NULL,
00370     eol_vec3d(0,0,0),
00371     0,
00372     eol_vec3d(0,0,0),
00373     eol_vec3d(0,0,0)
00374   );
00375 }

00408 eolComponent *eol_button_new(
00409     eolUint        id,
00410     eolWord        name,
00411     eolRectFloat   rect,
00412     eolRect        bounds,
00413     char         * buttonText,
00414     eolUint        buttonType,
00415     eolInt         buttonHotkey,
00416     eolUint        buttonHotkeymod,
00417     eolBool        center,
00418     char         * buttonFileUp,
00419     char         * buttonFileHigh,
00420     char         * buttonFileDown,
00421     eolVec3D       backgroundColor,
00422     eolFloat       backgroundAlpha,
00423     eolVec3D       highlightColor,
00424     eolVec3D       pressColor
00425   )
00426 {
00427   eolComponentButton *button = NULL;
00428   eolComponent *component = NULL;
00429   component = eol_component_new();
00430   if (!component)return NULL;
00431   eol_component_get_rect_from_bounds(&component->bounds,bounds,rect);
00432   eol_component_make_button(
00433     component,
00434     buttonText,
00435     buttonType,
00436     buttonHotkey,
00437     buttonHotkeymod,
00438     buttonFileUp,
00439     buttonFileHigh,
00440     buttonFileDown,
00441     backgroundColor,
00442     backgroundAlpha,
00443     highlightColor,
00444     pressColor
00445   );
00446   button = eol_component_get_button_data(component);
00447   if (button == NULL)
00448   {
00449     eol_component_free(&component);
00450     return NULL;
00451   }
00452   component->id = id;
00453   strncpy(component->name,name,EOLWORDLEN);
00454   eol_rectf_copy(&component->rect,rect);
00455   component->canHasFocus = eolTrue;
00456   component->type = eolButtonComponent;
00457   if (center)
00458   {
00459     button->centered = center;
00460     component->bounds.x -= component->bounds.w/2;
00461     component->bounds.y -= component->bounds.h/2;
00462     if (bounds.w != 0)
00463     {
00464       component->rect.x -= (component->bounds.w/(float)bounds.w)/2;
00465     }
00466     if (bounds.h != 0)
00467     {
00468       component->rect.y -= (component->bounds.h/(float)bounds.h)/2;
00469     }
00470   }
00471   return component;
00472 }

00474 eolComponent *eol_component_button_load(eolRect winrect,eolKeychain *def)
00475 {
00476   eolComponent *comp = NULL;
00477   eolLine buttonType;
00478   eolUint id;
00479   eolRectFloat rect;
00480   eolLine justify;
00481   eolLine buttonText;
00482   eolLine name;
00483   eolLine hotkey;
00484   eolLine hotmod;
00485   eolInt hotkeybutton = 0;
00486   eolInt hotkeymod = 0;
00487   eolLine buttonFile;
00488   eolLine buttonHighFile;
00489   eolLine buttonHitFile;
00490   eolVec3D backgroundColor;
00491   eolFloat backgroundAlpha;
00492   eolVec3D highlightColor;
00493   eolVec3D pressColor;
00494   eolBool  center = eolFalse;
00495 
00496   if (!def)return NULL;
00497   
00498   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(buttonType, def, "buttonType");
00499   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(name, def, "name");
00500   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_uint(&id, def, "id");
00501   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_rectfloat(&rect, def, "rect");
00502   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(justify, def, "justify");
00503   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(buttonText, def, "buttonText");
00504 
00505   if (eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(hotkey, def, "hotkey"))
00506   {
00507     hotkeybutton = eol_input_parse("key", hotkey);
00508   }
00509   if (eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(hotmod, def, "hotkeymod"))
00510   {
00511     hotkeymod = eol_input_parse("mod",hotmod);
00512   }
00513 
00514   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(buttonFile, def, "buttonImage");
00515   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(buttonHighFile, def, "buttonHigh");
00516   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_line(buttonHitFile, def, "buttonHit");
00517 
00518   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_vec3d(&backgroundColor, def, "backgroundColor");
00519   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_float(&backgroundAlpha, def, "backgroundAlpha");
00520   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_vec3d(&highlightColor, def, "highlightColor");
00521   eol_keychain_get_hash_value_as_vec3d(&pressColor, def, "pressColor");
00522 
00523   if (eol_line_cmp(justify,"CENTER") == 0)center = eolTrue;
00524   if (eol_line_cmp(buttonType,"STOCK") == 0)
00525   {
00526     comp = eol_button_stock_new(
00527       id,
00528       name,
00529       rect,
00530       winrect,
00531       buttonText,
00532       hotkeybutton,
00533       hotkeymod,
00534       eolFalse
00535     );
00536   }
00537   else if (eol_line_cmp(buttonType,"TEXT") == 0)
00538   {
00539     comp = eol_button_text_new(
00540       id,
00541       name,
00542       rect,
00543       winrect,
00544       buttonText,
00545       hotkeybutton,
00546       hotkeymod,
00547       eolFalse
00548     );
00549   }
00550   else if (eol_line_cmp(buttonType,"RECT") == 0)
00551   {
00552     comp = eol_button_new(
00553       id,
00554       name,
00555       rect,
00556       winrect,
00557       buttonText,
00558       eolButtonRect,
00559       hotkeybutton,
00560       hotkeymod,
00561       center,
00562       buttonFile,
00563       buttonHighFile,
00564       buttonHitFile,
00565       backgroundColor,
00566       backgroundAlpha,
00567       highlightColor,
00568       pressColor
00569     );
00570   }
00571   else if (eol_line_cmp(buttonType,"CUSTOM") == 0)
00572   {
00573     comp = eol_button_new(
00574       id,
00575       name,
00576       rect,
00577       winrect,
00578       buttonText,
00579       eolButtonCustom,
00580       hotkeybutton,
00581       hotkeymod,
00582       center,
00583       buttonFile,
00584       buttonHighFile,
00585       buttonHitFile,
00586       backgroundColor,
00587       backgroundAlpha,
00588       highlightColor,
00589       pressColor
00590 
00591     );
00592   }
00593   return comp;
00594 }
